Package index

Bias-reduced estimation

Main lavaan-style functions for bias-reduced estimation in SEM.

brcfa()
Fit confirmatory factor analysis model using empirical bias-reducing methods
brsem()
Fit a structural equation model using empirical bias-reducing methods
brgrowth()
Fit growth curve models using empirical bias-reducing methods
brlavaan()
Fit a latent variable model using bias-reducing methods
brlavaan-class
brlavaan Class

Penalty functions

Penalty functions for iRBM [For future implementation].

pen_ridge() pen_ridge_bound() pen_huber()
Functions for plugin penalty

Manual eBR and iBR fit functions

For internal testing purposes.

fit_sem()
Fit a structural equation model using bias-reducing methods
fit_twofac()
Fit two factor SEM using lavaan syntax manually
fit_growth()
Fit growth curve models using lavaan syntax manually

Helper functions for simulation studies

Functions to facilitate simulation study in our paper.

gen_data_growth() gen_data_twofac()
Generate data for simulation studies
truth_growth() truth_twofac() truth()
Retrieve the true values of the models used for simulation
txt_mod_growth_pop() txt_mod_growth()
Model specification for latent growth curve models
txt_mod_twofac_pop() txt_mod_twofac()
Model specification for two-factor SEM models
is_ML() is_eRBM() is_iRBM() is_iRBMp()
Predicates for brlavaan objects
